actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries, with amendment, H. Rept. 94-175.
Measure called up by special rule in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #198 (328-59).
Measure laid on table in House, S. 1542 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the fiscal years 1976 and 1977 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Commerce.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries with amendment, H. Rept. 94-175) Authorizes appropriations for fiscal year 1976 to the Department of Commerce for: (1) acquisition, construction, or reconstruction of ships; (2) payment of obligations incurred for ship operating-differential subsidy; (3) research and development; (4) reserve fleet; (5) training at the Merchant Marine Academy; (6) financial assistance to State Marine Schools, and (7) increases in employee salary and benefits. Increases the allowable aggregate for guarantee of obligations regarding Federal ship mortgage insurance from $5,000,000,000 to $7,000,000,000. Increases the per student annual subsistence payment to maritime academies and colleges from $600 to $1,200.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the fiscal years 1976 and 1977 for certain maritime programs of the Department of Commerce.
